text: Twin Falls Idaho is a 1999 American psychological drama movie directed by first time director Michael Polish (who also stars). Also starring Mark Polish, Michele Hicks, Jon Gries, Patrick Bauchau, Garrett Morris, Lesley Anne Warren, Sasha Alexander and Mary-Pat Green. It was distributed by Sony Picture Classics. ==Other websites== * * Category:1999 drama movies Category:1990s independent movies Category:1990s psychological movies Category:American drama movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies about twins Category:Movies set in Idaho Category:Movies directed by Michael Polish
title: Twin Falls Idaho (movie)
